info.title: Abstract Class Object Class
info.description: Manages a class smart object, including css (xml model + css code), javascript, documentation and manual.

parameter.name: $library
parameter.description: The object's library.

parameter.name: $package
parameter.description: The object's packge.

parameter.name: $namespace
parameter.description: The object's namespace.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The object's name. Leave empty for new objects and then call create().

method.name: create

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The object's name.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateSourceCode
method.description: Updates the source code of this object.

parameter.name: $header
parameter.description: The header code of the object.

parameter.name: $code
parameter.description: The code of the object's class.

method.returndescription: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure. Returns a string telling whether there is a syntax error in the php file.

method.name: buildSourceCode
method.description: Builds the source code in sections for easy parsing.

parameter.name: $header
parameter.description: The header code.

parameter.name: $classCode
parameter.description: The class code.

method.returndescription: The full source code in php format (including php tags).

method.name: getSourceCode

parameter.name: $full
parameter.description: If true, returns the entire php code without unwrap and un-section it. Otherwise, it returns only the class section.

method.returndescription: Returns the class code section of the object's source code.

method.name: getDependencies
method.description: Get all dependencies from the object given the dependencies' file.

parameter.name: $depFile
parameter.description: The dependencies' xml file. You can load the trunk's file or the release's file.

method.returndescription: An array of all dependencies including the use 'path' and use 'alias'.

method.name: getMetrics
method.description: Get all source code's metrics data for the given object.

parameter.name: $metFile
parameter.description: The metrics' xml file. You can load the trunk's file or the release's file.

method.returndescription: An array of all metrics data. Including: LOC CLOC SLOC-P NOF LOC-PF. For more information on explanation, see the DEV\Tools\phpParser.

method.name: includeSourceCode
method.description: Includes the object's source code file from the working branch's trunk.
method.returndescription: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

method.name: updateSourceDoc
method.description: Updates the documentation of the object's source code.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The documentation content in string format.

method.returndescription: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

method.name: getSourceDoc
method.returndescription: The object's documentation in XML format.

method.name: getJSCode
method.returndescription: The object's javascript code.

method.name: updateJSCode

parameter.name: $code
parameter.description: The new javascript code.

method.returndescription: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

method.name: loadJSCode
method.description: Loads the object's javascript code into the output buffer.
method.returndescription: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

method.name: getCSSCode

parameter.name: $normalCss
parameter.description: If true, return the parsed css code, else it returns the initial scss. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: The object's css code.

method.name: updateCSSCode

parameter.name: $code
parameter.description: The new css code.

method.returndescription: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

method.name: loadCSSCode
method.description: Loads the object's css code into the output buffer.
method.returndescription: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

method.name: getCSSModel
method.returndescription: The object's css model.

method.name: updateCSSModel

parameter.name: $model
parameter.description: The new css model in xml format.

method.returndescription: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

method.name: getLibrary
method.returndescription: The library name.

method.name: getPackage
method.returndescription: The package name.

method.name: getNamespace

parameter.name: $full
parameter.description: If TRUE, includes the library and the package in the return value.

method.returndescription: The object's namespace.

method.name: getObjectFullPath
method.description: Abstract function for getting the object's full path from the inherited class.
method.returndescription: The object's full path.

method.name: getItemFullname
method.description: Gets the item's full name (including the extension).
method.returndescription: The item's fullname.

method.name: updateDependencies

parameter.name: $code
parameter.description: The source code to parse the dependencies from.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateMetrics
method.description: Update the source code's metrics data.

parameter.name: $code
parameter.description: The source code to parse the metrics from.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
